Introduction.paragraph1: Hello, I'm Jim from Taiwan, passionate about Geographic Information Science (GIScience), deep learning, and remote sensing technology. I hold Master's and Bachelor's degrees in Geography from National Taiwan Normal University. At CCIS Ltd., I developed automated appraisal processes by integrating geospatial technology with internal algorithms.
Introduction.paragraph2: I'm currently a teaching assistant at Florida State University, Department of Geography. I'm gonna spend next few years in Florida to work with Dr.Fotheringham and discover new insights

Works.title: Work Experience
Works.role_2: GIS Intern (Official agency of ESRI in Taiwan)

About.Title: I'm Jim. Currently live in Tallahassee, where I devote myself to the field of
About.intro: Wsp! Thanks for stopping by. I’m Jim, a dedicated and experienced GIS professional eager to continue exploring and contributing to Geographic Information Science in my future career. Some highlights about me and my activities:
About.highlight_content_current: Ph.D. student at Florida State University, Department of Geography
About.highlight_content_0: Member of National Taiwan Normal University, FORMOSAT-2 Image Application Distribute Center (IADC)
About.highlight_content_1: System developer at <guidelines>CCIS Joint Appraisal Firm Ltd</guidelines> in Taipei.
About.highlight_content_2: Part-time remote developer at <guidelines>JRShen Digital Culture (JSDC)</guidelines>

Publications.Title: I actively pursued opportunities to share my findings with the academic community.
Publications.Description: These are several of my publications, including conference, journal paper, and conference presentations. Even though this isn't much, everyone starts somewhere, right?

Articles.Title: I also enjoy writing articles and sharing my thoughts on various topics.
Articles.Description: Here are some of my articles, which cover a wide range of topics, from GIS technology to journal paper review. However, I haven't written many articles yet, but I'm looking forward to sharing more in the future.
